nodes.text: "Totally Patriotic" was a song by the anti-Imperial band Red Shift Limit and the title track from their album of the same name. The album was Red Shift Limit's latest release in the period of time between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY.

"Totally Patriotic" was a new rendition of a song with the same title by the pro-Imperial band The Emperor's New Clothes. Red Shift Limit's version was completely different from the original song; the band changed its intended meaning entirely.

"Totally Patriotic" was mentioned in the 1993 reference book Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann.
